text: 10.22: Mt 24.9; 24.13; Mk 13.13; Ru 21.17; Zo 15.18-21Kha nuianan ki gumgi, mbe nde suaŋ ndavi shirga. Mbe nde nzuav ndavi shi, ne khaŋ muuŋgi, na zɨ nden ki. Mbe ne suaŋv nde suaŋ ndavi shirga. Kha bigi hɨrga, guma thɨga havhargip kɨv kɨrim, kha nuian za vhɨzi tuk hɨgi, Fhe Bakɨme taagi mba guma ndigɨrga.
